alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone; Fulton; Marion; Newton; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 9:11AM CDT until March 30 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Marion County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Boone County in north central Arkansas... Baxter County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Fulton County in north central Arkansas... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 911 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dugger, or 12 miles southwest of Yellville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Yellville... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Salesville... Western Grove... Viola... Briarcliff... Pyatt... Valley Springs... Arkawana... Dugger... Olvey... Ott... Duff... Lakeway... Bull Shoals State Park... Clark Hill... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Boone; Fulton; Marion; Newton; Searcy
